info.name: Firefox Windows 10
info.description:
Basic modifications and adaptation to Windows 10. Title bar changes the colour according to the selected in Windows 10. Minimal style.

Alternative dark theme: https://userstyles.org/styles/133380/firefox-windows-10-edge-dark
info.additionalInfo: Version 1.4 Changelog: 1.4 - Code cleaning - New tab opening animation - Tab scrolling styled to match the rest - Minor changes 1.31 - Improved tab differentiation in background 1.3 - Fixed pinned tabs not displaying correctly when multiple tabs were opened 1.2 - Removed margin on top left 1.1 - Minor fixes - Improved compatibility with light colours - Added transition effect 1.01 - Minor fixes - Removed unnecessary code 1.0 - Initial release
